text: The 72nd annual Locarno Festival was held from 7 August to 17 August 2019. The debut feature by Italian director-producer Ginevra Elkann's Magari will open the festival, and Kiyoshi Kurosawa's To the Ends of the Earth will be screened as closing film. ==Juries==
